message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $11,500.  I believe it presents a great value at this price.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe that's a more reasonable price for the product.
Bob, thanks for the offer.  I understand your perspective, but I believe the fair market value of this product is higher than that.  Would you consider $11,000?
I'm still not convinced that's the best price. I'd be willing to meet you halfway, but I think I can do $10,250. That's as high as I'm willing to go.
